resources.string: Mixing two different fuels to obtain the correct octane rating is a common amongst racing practices. Octane ratings are used to maximize the performance of your race engine. This tool will allow you to calculate how much of each octane rating to use to get a desired octane rating.

Octane+ is a mathematical extrapolation tool only, and is not meant to be for scientific calculations. By accepting this statement, I agree that I am using this app for informational purposes only and I am the only person held responsible for any consequences in using mixed fuels/octanes.
There are no saved octane calculations on your favorites list. After making a calculation, you may add it to your favorite list.
